## Quaternion.slerp() method

Performs a spherical linear interpolation between two quat.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static slerp(a: Quaternion, b: Quaternion, t: number, result?: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```

Description

The first operand.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

b


</td><td>

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)


</td><td>

The second operand.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

t


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The interpolation amount, in the range \[0-1\].


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The output quaternion (can be the same as a or b), if not specified, a new quaternion will be created.


</td></tr>

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)
